# Nuhman PK | Senior Software Engineer – Full Stack & ML, apparently at 24 | Building scalable solutions

I’m Nuhman, a passionate software engineer and open-source developer specializing in Python, full-stack development, and AI/ML technologies. I thrive on building scalable, production-ready solutions, contributing to the developer community, and exploring emerging technologies. I enjoy creating tools, libraries, and frameworks that empower developers and streamline workflows.

## Personal Information
- [Malappuram, Kerala](https://www.google.com/maps/place/Malappuram): Location information about Nuhman.

## Projects and Tools
### Development Tools
- [Super Logger](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=nuhmanpk.superlogger): A logging tool designed to enhance debugging and monitoring in applications.
- [Webtrench](https://pypi.org/project/Webtrench/): A web development tool aimed at improving workflow and efficiency.

### Python Libraries and APIs
- [YoutubeTags](https://pypi.org/project/YoutubeTags/): A Python API wrapper for easily extracting YouTube tags.
- [cv2filters](https://medium.com/@nuhmanpk/a-comprehensive-guide-to-cv2filters-a-powerful-opencv-wrapper-for-image-preprocessing-80c25c897f53): A powerful OpenCV wrapper for image preprocessing tasks.
- [Pyrogram](https://nuhmanpk.github.io/portfolio/nuhmanpk.medium.com/building-your-first-telegram-bot-with-pyrogram-a-step-by-step-guide-76fb1bf906aa): A step-by-step guide to building your first Telegram bot using Pyrogram.
- [PyroSnippets](https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=nuhmanpk.pyrosnippets): A collection of useful snippets for Python development.
- [PyplateX](https://github.com/nuhmanpk/PyPlateX): A tool for enhancing Python applications with additional features.
- [SnapNutriBot](https://github.com/nuhmanpk/SnapNutriBotV2): A Telegram bot designed for nutritional tracking and advice.
- [Quick Llama](https://pypi.org/project/quick-llama/): A tool for running Ollama models seamlessly in Google Colab.

### Machine Learning and AI
- [LangSmith](https://academy.langchain.com/certificates/cjpjsbukdl): A platform for developing language models and applications.
- [LangGraph](https://academy.langchain.com/certificates/1l7agmymtf): A tool for building ambient agents using language models.
- [LangChain](https://www.udemy.com/certificate/UC-27ec2619-1f5e-4d21-9895-69a5dfaa9955/): A framework for developing LLM-powered applications.
- [Pytorch for Deep Learning](https://www.udemy.com/certificate/UC-db3422ce-789f-4ee3-b95d-e0c17cc8a6a5/): Resources and tutorials for using PyTorch in deep learning projects.
- [Machine Learning](https://www.kaggle.com/learn/certification/nuhmanpk/intro-to-machine-learning): Comprehensive resources and guides on machine learning concepts.
- [ML Ops](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/public_profiles/350fa77e-4886-46b4-9d62-3910f47ba55c/badges/17138684): Best practices and tools for managing machine learning operations.

### Advanced Topics
- [Advanced SQL](https://www.kaggle.com/learn/certification/nuhmanpk/advanced-sql): In-depth resources for mastering SQL.
- [Build CNN with TensorFlow and Keras](https://www.kaggle.com/learn/certification/nuhmanpk/computer-vision): A guide to building Convolutional Neural Networks using TensorFlow and Keras.
- [Transformer Models and BERT Model](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/public_profiles/350fa77e-4886-46b4-9d62-3910f47ba55c/badges/6651890): Insights into transformer models and their applications.
- [Introduction to Image Generation](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/public_profiles/350fa77e-4886-46b4-9d62-3910f47ba55c/badges/6643394): An overview of techniques for generating images using AI.
- [Attention Mechanism](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/public_profiles/350fa77e-4886-46b4-9d62-3910f47ba55c/badges/6643540): Understanding the attention mechanism in neural networks.
- [Image Captioning Models](https://www.cloudskillsboost.google/public_profiles/350fa77e-4886-46b4-9d62-3910f47ba55c/badges/10376858): Exploring models that generate captions for images.
- [Fundamentals of MCP](https://huggingface.co/datasets/mcp-course/certificates/resolve/main/certificates/nuhmanpk/2025-06-09.png): Basic concepts and principles of Model Control Protocol.
- [Data Structures and Algorithms](https://www.udemy.com/certificate/UC-63a51b98-1624-470d-92e3-a8d4b6aebf1d/): Essential knowledge for software development and problem-solving.
